definition: wet spongy ground of decomposing vegetation, to get stuck while doing something
details:
noun
- wet spongy ground of decomposing vegetation
= synonyms: peat bog
verb
- to get stuck while doing something
= example: to get stuck while doing something
= synonyms: bog down
- to cause to slow down or get stuck
= example: to cause to slow down or get stuck
= synonyms: bog down
